channel.title: Ok one small favour
channel.description: on my server d claws require 60 def? how can i remove this?

item.title: Ok one small favour
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Spyder Owner Spyder
item.description:
@Owner_Spyder wrote:

Search for the item and look for where it says defence or skill[14] or something and it will say like “If skill 60” change to like 1, i think get back to me.

item.title: Ok one small favour
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

It depends.

Sometimes it is initialized like this.

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon].startsWith("Dragon")) {
//process to disallow wearing dragon weapons without a certain level.
}

sometimes it is like this

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon].contains("Dragon")) {
//process to disallow wearing dragon weapons without a certain level.
}

and sometimes it is


if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon].equalsIgnoreCase("Dragon claws") {
//process to disallow wearing dragon weapons without a certain level.
}

Something in that manner, and you can use an operator to make it not apply to Dragon Claws.

Read full topic

@silabgarza wrote:

or somethin like that lmao
